referenceObject.reference: Paquin, P., Dupérré, N. & Reddell, J. R. (2009). A new troglobitic Agyneta from Colorado, the first description of the female of Agyneta llanoensis from Texas caves, and a classification of North American cave Linyphiidae (Araneae) as troglobites or troglophiles. Texas Memorial Museum Speleological Monographs 7: 37-56.
